# Haxe Roundup № 41

Via twitter

box2d 2.1a for haXe has been released on github! via alijaya

DataStructures 1.31 and polygonal lib 1.4 have been released with better Heap & PriorityQueue implementations, SWC cleanup, minor fixes and more!

    • A detailed post on the changes made to the Heap and� PriorityQueue� classes

    • A free FDT haXe workshop will take place on June 11th at Flash and the City

  • via FlashAndTheCity

    • Via update

    The Simple Persistent Object Database library (SPOD) documentation has been updated with info on the added macro support making it more powerful, available in the haXe nightly builds
